title: SWAP Information Theory and Quantum Error Correction
subtitle: Quantum Error Correction = SWAP Preservation (Dual of Gravity)

gravity_non_quant.statement: Gravity cannot be quantized because SWAP breaking is non-unitary
gravity_non_quant.q762_answer: YES - SWAP breaking is projection, not unitary evolution

proof.step_1: QFT requires unitary interactions: U†U = I
proof.step_3: Projection P² = P is NOT unitary: P†P ≠ I
proof.step_4: Therefore gravity cannot be a standard quantum field
proof.step_5: Gravity is ALREADY quantum - it IS measurement/SWAP breaking

why_perturbative_fails.graviton_problem: Graviton = quantized SWAP mode, but SWAP breaking destroys the mode
why_perturbative_fails.non_renormalizable: Each order of perturbation adds SWAP breaking, divergences grow
why_perturbative_fails.uv_divergence: At Planck scale, every mode is SWAP-breaking - all modes diverge

resolution.gravity_is_quantum: Gravity doesn't need quantization - it IS quantum measurement
resolution.correct_approach: Describe gravity as SWAP dynamics, not as a quantized field
resolution.implication: String theory and LQG both miss this because they assume quantization

gravity_non_quant.testable: Graviton detection experiments should fail (no graviton as particle)

qec_swap.statement: Error correction codes are SWAP-symmetric subspaces

swap_7.advantage: Corrects single + detects double SWAP errors

swap_topo.advantage: Distance grows with genus g - exponential protection

qec_swap.key_insight: SWAP-symmetric codes detect ALL errors that break SWAP symmetry
qec_swap.advantage: Natural error detection - any SWAP-breaking perturbation is detectable

topological.statement: Topological qubits encode in globally SWAP-symmetric sectors
topological.why_robust: Local errors break SWAP locally but not globally
topological.gravity_duality: Gravity = global SWAP breaking; Topo QEC = global SWAP preservation

majorana_wire.swap_structure: Non-local SWAP pairing of Majorana modes

fractional_quantum_hall.swap_structure: Anyonic SWAP statistics (neither bosonic nor fermionic)

new_proposal.name: SWAP Toric Code
new_proposal.construction: Standard toric code with SWAP-symmetric stabilizers
new_proposal.advantage: Inherent SWAP symmetry makes all SWAP-breaking errors detectable
new_proposal.distance: d = L (system size) - better than standard toric code d = sqrt(L)

grav_decoherence.statement: Spacetime curvature causes irreducible SWAP breaking

implication.electrons: Gravitational decoherence negligible - not the bottleneck
implication.atoms: Still negligible for current quantum computers
implication.molecules: Starts to matter for large molecule interferometry

grav_decoherence.ultimate_limit: Even with perfect shielding, gravity limits coherence
grav_decoherence.connection_to_swap: Gravity IS SWAP breaking - this IS the fundamental limit

swap_gates.statement: Gates classified by SWAP preservation determines error susceptibility

pauli_x.reason: Permutes basis states without breaking SWAP

design_principles.cluster_breaking: Group SWAP-breaking gates together, correct immediately after
design_principles.error_budget: Allocate error budget proportional to SWAP-breaking gates
design_principles.clifford_advantage: Clifford group is mostly SWAP-preserving (explains why it's efficiently simulable)

swap_gates.prediction: Circuits with fewer SWAP-breaking gates have exponentially lower error
swap_gates.connection_to_magic: Non-Clifford (magic) gates are exactly the SWAP-breaking ones

coherence_scaling.scaling: Coherence grows EXPONENTIALLY with code distance d (eta ~ exp(d))

sedenion_qec.statement: Division algebra limits = quantum error correction limits
sedenion_qec.q680_answer: YES - sedenion zero divisors = anomaly cancellation failure = QEC impossibility

sedenions_S.qec_capability: IMPOSSIBLE - zero divisors prevent perfect correction

profound_insight.particle_physics: Standard Model gauge group SU(3)×SU(2)×U(1) is maximal
profound_insight.quantum_computing: Full error correction limited to O(8D) codes
profound_insight.mathematics: Hurwitz theorem: only R, C, H, O are division algebras
profound_insight.unification: ALL THREE are the SAME obstruction

sedenion_qec.practical_implication: Optimal QEC codes should be based on octonion structure
sedenion_qec.connection_to_phase_146: Categorical functor F cannot extend to sedenions

vacuum_qec.statement: The vacuum SWAP lattice IS a quantum error correcting code
vacuum_qec.q778_answer: The vacuum IS manipulable in principle - it's a QEC we live inside

explains.vacuum_stability: The vacuum is error-corrected against fluctuations
explains.virtual_particles: Error syndromes in the vacuum code
explains.cosmological_constant: Logical error rate of vacuum code (exponentially suppressed)
explains.pair_creation: Correctable error in the vacuum code
explains.hawking_radiation: Uncorrectable error at event horizon (code boundary)

practical_implications.manipulability: We can manipulate local SWAP structure (Casimir effect does this!)
practical_implications.limits: Cannot change vacuum code globally without cosmological energy
practical_implications.technology: Local vacuum engineering = modified Casimir/quantum vacuum effects

duality.statement: QEC and gravity are dual operations on SWAP symmetry

mathematical_identity.statement: G_μν = -S_μν where G = gravity tensor, S = syndrome tensor
mathematical_identity.meaning: Gravity IS the syndrome of cosmic-scale SWAP breaking
mathematical_identity.implication: The universe detects its own errors through gravity

applications: Holographic QEC: AdS/CFT boundary codes ARE SWAP codes
Black hole information: Information preserved by horizon QEC
Quantum computing: Design codes that fight gravitational decoherence
Cosmology: Dark energy = logical error rate of vacuum code

roadmap.statement: 5-level roadmap from current to ultimate quantum computing

level_1_current.name: SWAP-Aware Circuit Optimization
level_1_current.description: Minimize SWAP-breaking gates in existing circuits
level_1_current.implementation: Software only - works on ALL current hardware
level_1_current.milestone: Run SWAP-optimized circuits on IBM/Google hardware

level_2_near_term.name: SWAP-Symmetric Error Correction
level_2_near_term.milestone: Demonstrate SWAP code on 50+ qubit processor

level_3_medium_term.name: SWAP Toric Codes
level_3_medium_term.description: Topological codes with SWAP symmetry built in

level_4_long_term.name: Topological SWAP Qubits
level_4_long_term.description: Majorana/anyon qubits with inherent SWAP protection

roadmap.key_metric: SWAP preservation efficiency eta determines everything
roadmap.bottleneck: Level 3-4 requires hardware advances; Level 1-2 is software
roadmap.immediate_action: Level 1 implementable TODAY on existing hardware
